summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego talent marketplace. All requested features verified working: Client registration (via admin API), login, browse talents, view talent profile, service prices in 'coins' format, booking flow with coin balance check, redirect to /dashboard/verify after booking, verification page loads correctly with 4-step flow. Fixed TypeScript error in BookingsClient.tsx (missing scheduled_at in Booking interface).

integration_issues.issue: Registration form submits but does not redirect to dashboard. Supabase auth signUp call appears to complete but no session is established. User stays on /register page. Workaround: Create users via Supabase Admin API with email_confirm: true.

Dashboard uses mock talent data with simple IDs ('1', '2', '3', '4') instead of real UUIDs from database. Clicking on dashboard talent cards leads to 404 because /talent/1 doesn't exist. Browse page works correctly with real talent UUIDs.

action_items: Investigate Supabase registration flow - signUp not establishing session (may need email confirmation disabled in Supabase dashboard)
Update DashboardClient.tsx to fetch real talents from database instead of using mockTalents array
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ All formatPrice functions in TalentProfileClient, BrowseClient, DashboardClient return 'X coins' format
✓ VerifyClient.tsx correctly uploads selfies to Supabase Storage 'verifications' bucket
✓ Booking flow correctly deducts coins from wallet and moves to escrow
✓ Verification page has 4-step flow: intro, selfie, details, complete
Fixed: Added scheduled_at and notes fields to Booking interface in /app/frontend/src/types/database.ts
seed_data_creation: Test user created via Supabase Admin API with email_confirm: true. Wallet balance updated to 200000 coins for booking test.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core flows verified working: login, browse, talent profile, booking, verification. Registration via UI not working (Supabase auth issue). Dashboard uses mock data for featured talents. Test user testclient@nego.test exists with booking b7cc4750-8355-4da3-9588-55b46058feba in verification_pending status.

verified_working.login: ✓ Login with email/password works correctly, redirects to /dashboard
verified_working.dashboard: ✓ Dashboard loads with coin balance, featured talents (mock data), navigation
verified_working.browse_page: ✓ Browse page shows real talents from database with correct 'coins' format prices
verified_working.talent_profile: ✓ Talent profile page loads with services, prices in 'coins' format, gallery
verified_working.service_selection: ✓ Services can be selected, total calculated, balance checked
verified_working.insufficient_balance: ✓ Shows 'Insufficient Balance' warning when coins < service price
verified_working.booking_modal: ✓ Booking modal shows selected services, date/time inputs, balance, confirm button
verified_working.booking_creation: ✓ Booking created successfully, coins deducted, moved to escrow
verified_working.verify_page_step1: ✓ Verification intro page shows booking info, steps, privacy notice
verified_working.verify_page_step2: ✓ Selfie upload step shows camera/upload area
verified_working.coins_format: ✓ All prices throughout app show 'X coins' format (not NGN)
